fields.name: Skill Description
fields.value:
• Nun activates the <Healing Light> skill with every 2 basic heals
• The skill __restores lost health__ of all friendly units within range.
• The skill also __removes control effect__ (e.g. curse) on affected units
• Basic healing: 130 / 170 / 220 / 270 / 330 / 390 / 450 / 520 / 910
• Skill healing: 135 / 150 / 165 / 195 / 240 / 300 / 375 / 450 / 790

fields.name: Main Uses
fields.value: • Nuns are commonly used to increase durability of long-range troops and remove curses from Voodoo Dolls.
